full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 33 of 261 1173 LC6Cmax1 Kate - direct 1 Q. And you mentioned that you met her through a friend. About how old was the friend? 2 A. He was about 35. 3 Q. And what was the nature of your relationship with the friend? 4 A. We were dating. 5 Q. Did you speak with Maxwell the night you met her? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. What, if anything, did you and Maxwell speak about? 8 A. We spoke about -- we spoke about the evening and where we were, you know, we were headed to -- out for the evening. And we spoke about where I lived, we spoke about the man that I was dating. She was asking me things about myself. 9 Q. What did Maxwell look like when you met her? 10 A. She was very sophisticated and very elegant. And she had short -- quite short dark brown hair. She just -- she was very impressive. 11 Q. About how old did she seem? 12 A. In her 30s. 13 MS. POMERANTZ: Ms. Drescher, can we please pull up what's in evidence as Government Exhibit 115. 14 Q. Do you recognize the person in this photograph? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. Who is it? 17 A. It's Ghislaine Maxwell. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018370

1 Q. And you mentioned that you met her through a friend. About how old was the friend? 2 A. He was about 35. 3 Q. And what was the nature of your relationship with the friend? 4 A. We were dating. 5 Q. Did you speak with Maxwell the night you met her? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. What, if anything, did you and Maxwell speak about? 8 A. We spoke about -- we spoke about the evening and where we were, you know, we were headed to -- out for the evening. And we spoke about where I lived, we spoke about the man that I was dating. She was asking me things about myself. 9 Q. What did Maxwell look like when you met her? 10 A. She was very sophisticated and very elegant. And she had short -- quite short dark brown hair. She just -- she was very impressive. 11 Q. About how old did she seem? 12 A. In her 30s. 13 MS. POMERANTZ: Ms. Drescher, can we please pull up what's in evidence as Government Exhibit 115. 14 Q. Do you recognize the person in this photograph? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. Who is it? 17 A. It's Ghislaine Maxwell.
